channel.title: Prajwals Blog
channel.description: Hi I'm Prajwal, and this is my blog. Here, I share through my writing my experience as a Computer science student and everything I'm learning about on React, Typescript, Go, Serverless, System Design and Testing.

item.title: Why India is obsessed with engineering?
item.description: In the world japan is famous producing for its electronics, France is famous for producing baking eatables, Italy is famous for producing wine and cheese, America is famous for producing automobiles, aerospace, etc..
item.content:encoded: In the world japan is famous producing for its electronics, France is famous for producing baking eatables, Italy is famous for producing wine and cheese, America is famous for producing automobiles, aerospace, etc..

item.title: Namespaces in Typescript
item.description: In this article we will try to grasp the concept of namespaces and how they are helpful and finally we will learn how to use them in Typescript.
item.content:encoded: In this article we will try to grasp the concept of namespaces and how they are helpful and finally we will learn how to use them in Typescript.
item.author: prajwalprakash3722@gmail.com (Prajwal P)

item.title: Analyzing Array.sort() & measuring the performance in JavaScript
item.author: prajwalprakash3722@gmail.com (Prajwal P)

item.title: Why I Prefer Type-Script more than JavaScript …?
item.description: If you have experience with JS you know that the data type is completely dynamic, to give you a example, I declare arr` as a const , and try to apply arr.map()` function, This is a error because arr` is not a array to map through and we’ll get to know this error during run (JS doesn’t need any compiling we can directly run / interpret it in Browser) time which is more frustrating for a developer
item.content:encoded: If you have experience with JS you know that the data type is completely dynamic, to give you a example, I declare arr` as a const , and try to apply arr.map()` function, This is a error because arr` is not a array to map through and we’ll get to know this error during run (JS doesn’t need any compiling we can directly run / interpret it in Browser) time which is more frustrating for a developer
item.author: prajwalprakash3722@gmail.com (Prajwal P)

item.title: The Problem which no one Overlooks
item.description: After all you might think several students wear glasses and need no further assistance same happens with deaf students, But hearing loss is more complicated than that.

item.title: The Respect !!!
item.description: Sir, It has been around 10 years, Since we came to Bengaluru.When me and my wife came here I had only 1000 rupees in my hand, I worked some odd jobs and saved enough money to open this hotel back in 5–6 years, Since then my life has been going good, My children are studying
item.content:encoded: Sir, It has been around 10 years, Since we came to Bengaluru.When me and my wife came here I had only 1000 rupees in my hand, I worked some odd jobs and saved enough money to open this hotel back in 5–6 years, Since then my life has been going good, My children are studying

item.title: Let's Talk Money: You've Worked Hard for It, Now Make It Work for You
item.description: Do you know why most sports athletes go broke just after few years of retiring ? They almost retire with 250% more than the net worth of a common man. still go broke. The main reason Is Poor Finance Planning!!
item.content:encoded: Do you know why most sports athletes go broke just after few years of retiring ? They almost retire with 250% more than the net worth of a common man. still go broke. The main reason Is Poor Finance Planning!!
item.author: prajwalprakash3722@gmail.com (Prajwal P)

item.title: How Lucky Are We……?
item.description: F*** this Covid, I thought to myself, having cursed the pandemic countless times. This time wasn’t that much different. If it wasn’t for the pandemic, I would have had a blissful college life.
item.content:encoded: F*** this Covid, I thought to myself, having cursed the pandemic countless times. This time wasn’t that much different. If it wasn’t for the pandemic, I would have had a blissful college life.

item.title: The Silent Struggle
item.description: Hearing aids are just a medium that connects us to the outer world. They are an integral part of my life; I do not go anywhere without them. I got introduced to this world on July 3rd 2002 and was declared deaf within 5 months.
item.content:encoded: Hearing aids are just a medium that connects us to the outer world. They are an integral part of my life; I do not go anywhere without them. I got introduced to this world on July 3rd 2002 and was declared deaf within 5 months.
item.author: prajwalprakash3722@gmail.com (Prajwal P)

item.title: Ikigai: The Japanese Secret to a Long and Happy Life.
item.description: Do you know why most sports athletes go broke just after few years of retiring ? They almost retire with 250% more than the net worth of a common man. still go broke. The main reason Is Poor Finance Planning!!

item.title: Rich Dad Poor Dad: Assets and Liability management
item.description: It encourages you to invest in real estate, and there if you make a loss it teaches how to be not sad about losing the money instead of taking it as a lesson for future investments. It gives you simple explanations of how money works. It will not give you any trading tips, but it helps you understand the things no one teaches us in the school or at home. The financial insights aid you to take action, and be your boss.
item.content:encoded: It encourages you to invest in real estate, and there if you make a loss it teaches how to be not sad about losing the money instead of taking it as a lesson for future investments. It gives you simple explanations of how money works. It will not give you any trading tips, but it helps you understand the things no one teaches us in the school or at home. The financial insights aid you to take action, and be your boss.
item.author: prajwalprakash3722@gmail.com (Prajwal P)

item.title: Three Thousand Stitches: Ordinary People, Extraordinary Lives.
item.description: Two decades ago when she tried to make changes in the DEVDASIS’S life they threw chappals at her, when she went for the second time they threw tomatoes at her instead of taking this as a strict no she took this incident as an improvement
item.content:encoded: Two decades ago when she tried to make changes in the DEVDASIS’S life they threw chappals at her, when she went for the second time they threw tomatoes at her instead of taking this as a strict no she took this incident as an improvement
